# Maintenance Report

## Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

## Maintenance Type
- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Dependency update
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Bug fix (non-critical)
- [ ] Other: [specify]

## Impact
Explain the impact of this maintenance task (e.g., improves code quality, reduces technical debt, etc.).

## Timeline
Proposed timeline for completing this task (e.g., 1 week, 2 sprints).

## Additional Context
Add any other context or details about the maintenance task here.
